Windows Media Services
tns:DisplayTemplate.tns:Text:
<!--Inserted by Commerce Server--> <script language="vbscript" type="text/VB"> sub WMA1{%Unique%}_click(Button, ShiftState, x, y) if Button = 1 then window.open "{%RedirectUrl%}?ciid={%item_id%}&cachename={%CacheName%}&PageGroupId={%PageGroupId%}&url={%ClickUrl%}", "{%TargetFrame%}" end if end sub </script>
<object id="WMA1{%Unique%}" width="{%Width%}" height="{%Height%}" classid="CLSID:22D6f312-B0F6-11D0-94AB-0080C74C7E95" codebase="http://activex.microsoft.com/activex/controls/mplayer/en/nsmp2inf.cab#Version=6,4,5,715" standby="Loading Microsoft® Windows Media™ Player components..." type="application/x-oleobject"> <param name="ClickToPlay" value="False" /> <param name="SendMouseClickEvents" value="True" /> <param name="FileName" value="{%asfURL%}?CEVT={T=CAMP,CI={%item_id%},PG={%PageGroupId%},EVT=DOWNLOAD}" /> <param name="ShowControls" value="False" /> <param name="AutoRewind" value="True" /> <param name="AutoStart" value="True" />
<embed type="application/x-mplayer2" pluginspage="http://www.microsoft.com/isapi/redir.dll?prd=windows&sbp=mediaplayer&ar=Media&sba=Plugin" src="{%asfURL%}?CEVT={T=CAMP,CI={%item_id%},PG={%PageGroupId%},EVT=DOWNLOAD}" name="MediaPlayer" width="{%Width%}" height="{%Height%}"> </embed> </object>
